content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: GAAHHH!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: It's SOOOO good to see you!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Like, don't get me wrong.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I LOVE this place.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: It's, like, my favorite place. Of ALL TIME.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: 'Cause I spend all my time here. And it's perfect.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Obviously.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: But sometimes it, like, feels kind of empty???

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Because I LOVE people, too.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I'm a person-person.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Cat-person.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: People-cat-person!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And that's, like, the one thing this place can't do.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Make people. Summon them.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: ANYWAYS, it just means that I have to WAIT and HOPE that someone comes.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And you did! Which is super cool!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: YAY!!!

content.name: {player}
content.dialogue: You're kind of, um, excitable.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Duh! That's part of my CHARM!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: My CHARISMA!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: My JE-NE-SAIS-QUOI!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: It's, like, an immutable fact of my incredible being!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: The LIGHT that I bring into the world!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: This WORLD! This PLACE!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: But, totally, THANK YOU for noticing!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: It's, like, super sweet that you're paying attention to me.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I LOVE attention! I crave it!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I YEARN for it like the children for the mines.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I. Need. It!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: But I'm also, like, super into paying attention to other people.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Like, I want to SEE you babe.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I want to know ALL the things.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: To, like, osmosis all of you into my person.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: You know?

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Because that's, like, the super cool thing that happens

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: When you spend a lot of time with someone.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: You get to, like, learn EVERYTHING about them.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And then freaking REVEL in it!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Isn't that awesome?

options.text: For sure! I want to celebrate and be celebrated!
Eh. I'd rather push and pull, you know?

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: TOTALLY!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I LOVE that we're, like, on the same page with that.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: 'Cause it's so important to, like, appreciate the people around us???

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Because they're BEAUTIFUL!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And AMAZING!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And right freaking HERE!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: GAAHHH!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I just, like, never want anyone in my life to feel like I don't see them, you know?

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I'm like, I SEE YOU!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I LOVE YOU!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: GET IT BESTIE!!!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: That's the energy I'm trying to bring to the space.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: My space. All space.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: All the time.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And it's, like, really awesome that you're about that too.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: It's, like, super SWEET.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: We should TOTALLY talk more about this!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Oh. Huh.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: That's, like, pretty cool too.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: I think.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: 'Cause, like, growing as a person is also super important.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Like, we're all AMAZING!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: But we could also be MORE amazing!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: With, like, time, and effort, and stuff.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And then we'll, like, bring even BETTER energy to the space!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And be like, Yes BESTIE, look at you GO!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: GROW!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And, like, support each other through the process.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Or something like that.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Which is cool, in it's own way.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And, like, differing perspectives are cool too.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: And, you know, really important.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: So yeah. Super great that you're true to yourself.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: That's, like, amazing!

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Maybe if we see each other again you can, uh, tell me more about it.

content.name: Pixie
content.dialogue: Or something.
